name: Super Ball M
description:
Super Ball M is top down ARCADE  2D game where the player is a BALL that moves RIGHT and LEFT without stopping, you can stop it by touching the screen to avoid OBSTACLES and earn points, Also you can get COINS they help you to continue the game if you LOSE, there is also a bubble POWER UP that's stay on the BALL about 5 seconds, you can DESTROY the OBSTACLES with it and gain a COIN.
The GOAL of the SUPER BALL M is to CHALLENGE YOURSELF every time you get a HIGH SCORE.

assets: kenney.nl/assets/

sounds: kenney.nl/ & freesound.org
